title: 'Value for money ..Have to compromise with built quality'
body: 'Writing after using it for 3 months. Pros - 1.Super light and thin 2.Great processor 3.Good display 4.Boots in 12 to 13 seconds in windows 11 5.Great value for money. 6. Got it for just (45k) 7. Superb Battery life (about 6 hrs with general usage)  Cons - 1.Plastic Body 2. Not very sturdy. 3. Bends a bit when held with one hand 4.Keyboard seems cheap. 5.Camers is decent 6. Build quality 7/10 7. Having some display issue with the build quality 8'

title: 'Good laptop worth the purchase'
body: Good laptop but got issues in adapter as well as motherboard within the first month of purchase. The HP support response is too slow. To get this repaired/ replaced I had to wait 2 months before all repairs were done. Since repairs it's working as good as it was.

title: 'laptop processor'
body: 'My opinion after using this laptop for 20 days as follow ; 1. Speaker volume is exorbitant. 2. Laptop run about 4 to 5 hrs after full charging. 3. Multitasking is easier in this laptop as it runs smoothly bz of its good processor. 4. Built quality of this laptop is slightly poor as compared to other laptops. 5. laptop will be much usefull if got an extra M2 slot for extra SSD OR HDD. 6. wifi connectivity and bluetooth connectivity is good Overall to by this laptop is value for money for me as in "GREAT FESTIVAL SALE\'\' this laptop is of MRP 42990 and by applying HDFC Debit card offer I got this laptop in Rs 38990 so to buy this laptop is a great deal for me'

title: 'Good purchase'
body: Battery life could be more but it's not worst. Other than that everything is good. It's a very good purchase.

title: 'Amazing Performance and Delivery
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'The Laptop is giving Awesome Performance. I have installed Windows 11 on the day I got this from Amazon. All the Apps are working great. Even after using heavy software like video editing or graphic designing apps, the system doesn't heat at all. No sound of the fan. Comes with MS office 2019 which is a plus point. Mcafee Antivirus comes along with it. But it's not required as windows have their own windows defender. Mcafee Makes the system slower I had to remove it. Center alignment of the Taskbar is very helpful. Gives you good performance even if you create more desktops. The only Flaw I found is Windows 11 doesn't show separated windows for the same type of files. It combines them. Which is sometimes irritating. But overall the System is amazing.

title: 'Good product for students and casual office use.'
body: 'Product is good. Build quality could have been little better specially keypad area. Backlit keypad if given would have been better. Overall happy with product performance for daily use.'

title: 'Under 45 this is best laptop'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. All features are awesome smooth running under high load nicely working not so much heat just a warm feeling under the laptop when you use the internet. Dont buy those persons who want a huge storage in laptop it can only handle 512gb max but who want a smooth performance laptop they can buy it. Great look.'

title: 'Superbbb...'
body: 'Best laptop for computer science students and heavy workloads like AI MLand deep learning. Its hexacore ryzen 5 processor manages multiple tasks very well and smoothly with a base clock speed of 2.8 . Its battery life is also good around 4 to 5 hrs with heavy tasks and with 65W fast charging it charge from 20% to 90%'

title: 'Worth money. But Anti glare is not there'
body: 'Battery life is good value for money. Anti hlare is not there. But finishing is good.I bought it for my daughter for online classes. She likes it. It is light weight.'

title: 'Laptop with best battery backup and performance under 45k is awesome.'
body: 'Best in this price range. Battery backup is around 10 to 12 hrs in normal use like web browsing. 8 to 10 hrs while coding and 6 to 7 hrs while watching YouTube videos. Look wise it feels a premium laptop build quality is also superb. Performance is also top notch because of hexa core processor. Worth buying under 45k because of only 256gb ssd otherwise it is best under 50k.'

title: 'Excellent performance Laptop
body: '4.0 out of 5 stars''Excellent laptop with great performance. Battery life is good haven‚Äôt measured yet. The only issue is built quality is flimsy on the keyboard area. Can literally see the panel moving down on keystrokes. On the flip side good display great performance lightweight & thin.'
